attributes.action: initiate and undertake meaningful International discussion to ban all FREE email.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This morning I received almost 3000 SPAM e-mails. 
A nominal charge for email would eliminate the majority of SPAM. 
I appreciate that this would have to be an International effort but unless someone takes the initiative the e-mail system will become un-useable.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
